name: 尤尚邦
objective:
欲參加國手選拔之學生可以修此課程，而且同時修「專業深根實習一」。每週實習 5 天，必須跟原培訓單位、職訓中心合作與實習。修此課程，必須先提出申請，經技優專班辦公室核准。
Students who want to participate in the selection of national players can take this course and also take "Professional Deep Internship (1)". Internship 5 days a week, must cooperate with the original training unit, vocational training center and internship. To take this course, you must first submit an application, which is approved by the Office.
schedule: 由訓練老師及授課教師協作規畫。
scorePolicy: 由訓練老師及授課教師協作規畫。
consultation: 教師諮商時間與聯絡請以 email 聯絡預約。
remarks: 因應疫情防疫規定，可能調整教學方式 (遠距教學)，請注意北科 i 學園公佈事項。北科 i 學園：https://nportal.ntut.edu.tw/

name: 陳柏端
objective:
1. 安排至企業實習，每星期五實習一天。
2. 參加國手選拔，到企業、原培訓單位、或職訓中心實習。
3. 回原培訓單位，協助訓練選手，經驗傳承。
1. Arrange for internship in companies, on every Friday.
2. Participate in the selection of national players, and practice in enterprises, original training units, or vocational training centers.
3. Return to the original training unit to help train the players and transfer their experience.
schedule: 1-18 周，安排至企業實習、到單位培訓
scorePolicy:
50% 主管評分
50% 周誌、報告繳交
